attributes.action: To stop the clocks going forward by one hour in UK (day light savings) during the winter months as this causes an increase in fuel usage for heating, has a negative impact on road safety and does not encourage outdoor activities out of normal working hours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop the clocks going forward by one hour in UK (day light savings) during the winter months as this causes an increase in fuel usage for heating, has a negative impact on road safety and does not encourage outdoor activities out of normal working hours.
